name: TRANS mission (Laserbeam)
description:
The game features our determined hero trying to make it up the mountain in order to transmit his beautiful song to the aliens.

Space to start. Arrow keys to play. And the escape key is only enabled while in the menus.

Made for Global Game Jam 2018. Spent a couple hours overtime to cleanup and achieve our full artistic vision. (Horrible) source code available here https://github.com/laserbeam3/GlobalGameJam2018
